title: svAmi nAn unran (varNam)
sahitya:
svAmi nAn unran aDimai enru ulagamellAm ariyumE
tAmadam sheyyAdhu vandaruL mAdOr pangA bhUdEsA
nAmAmrta pAnamE en jIvanamE enRu nambinEnE
naTanamADum sEvaDi tarishanam enru kiDaikkum enavE EnginEnE
			(muktAyi svara sAhityam)
senjaDADaviyil iLambirai deiva gangaiyum Oraravum Ada
iLa naghai tavamum shevvidazhudan tadhIm ena ciTrambalam tanil ADum


caraNam    naTarAjA dEvA sacchidAnandA
			(caraNa svara sAhityas)
1:  ADum nin azhagil kAdal koNDa ivaLaip-pAr
 
 caraNam 2    nandhi bhrngi shiva kaNam munivargaLum indiran mudal amara kOTigaL paNiyum
 
 caraNam 3    punnakai tavazh idazhin azhagaiyum kaDaikkaN azhagaiyum kaNDAL mazhup- paDaiyai shen shaDaiyai tOluDaiyai matagaja naDaiyai ninainndurugum ivaLai ANDaruL
  caraNam 4    nI varam tara uDan viraindu vA meyyanbu koNDu ninaindu nAL muzhudum tan ninaivilAL kaN urangilaL uNavaruNDilaL tirup-peyarai sholli sholli pulambuvaL tanimai tanilE kala kalavena naghaitthiDum ivaLin viraham taNiya aruL nI puriyAviDilE mOsham varum pAsahmuDan vanNdaruL
